title: Team Invoked OOL LF Coach
body:
We have a team of all challenger players and are looking for someone who is experienced in coaching or at the least can show aptitude towards coaching a League of Legends Team. 

The primary roles we need this coach to fulfill are: vod reviews, helping the players reflect after matches, and pick/ban phase.

Our players are willing to practice as much as they can to win this tournament and I want to make sure that we have the support staff in place to ensure their practice is optimised. Our team came second on the first weekend of OOL despite having only two scrim sessions in the days immediately prior.

To any who wish to apply for this role we will undertake a trial process to determine the quality of your coaching over the course of one week.

If you are interested, or wish for further information, please add myself in game: PowPowPanda

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: Hey powpowpanda! I added you on league. My ign is quintana :)
